citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:50pm on April 4,
2023. Contact was attempted by knocking on the door. The phone number was called, and contact was made with the
licensee who stated he was unavailable to facilitate the inspection and there were no other representatives available.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:50pm on April 4, 
2023. Contact was attempted by knocking on the door. The phone number was called, and contact was made with the 
licensee who stated he was unavailable to facilitate the inspection and there were no other representatives available. 
 
 
 
End Section
